summary: This mod Add's zero's sword from BL2 to skyrim you can find it in whiterun with a greatsword and 2 smaller swords
descriptionHtml:
[u][color=#ff7700]This mod Add's zero's sword from BL2 to skyrim you can find it in whiterun with a greatsword and 2 smaller swords please tell me if there is any issues [/color][/u]

[color=#00ffff]To craft it you need [/color]
(Short Sword) 
1. Ebony Ingot 
1. Leather Strip 
1. Moonstone Ingot 
Ebony Smithing Perk 

(Great Sword) 
4. Ebony Ingot 
1. Leather Strip 
1. Moonstone Ingot 
Ebony Smithing Perk 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
The items you see above are needed to make both the short sword and the greatsword versions 

[color=#00ffff]upgrading them requires [/color]
1. Ebony Ingot 

And finaly I stored the swords in a chest to advoid ncp's and other forces nocking them around and causing major desk flipping 

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#ff7700][size=6]I hope you guys enjoy this mod and kick some tush![/size][/color][/font]
author: RussianModer4545
